title: Robinhood's Higher Crypto Revenue Could be Positive for Coinbase Earnings
description: The shares of the popular trading platform rose 15% after beating earnings and revenue estimates.

title: ‘Almost All Pyramid Schemes’ In Russia Are Crypto Related, Central Bank Says
description: The Central Bank of Russia counted 5,735 financial scams and 2,944 pyramid schemes in 2023, up big time from the year before.

title: Nintendo Switch 2 Preview: Everything You Need to Know
description: UPDATED: The Nintendo Switch 2 will reportedly play Switch games with enhancements—and the hardware reveal may be right around the corner.

title: Bitcoin recovers to $49.7k after failing to find support above $50k
description:
Bitcoin (BTC) saw its price recover above $49,700 on the evening of Feb. 13 — closing in on its earlier daily high. As of 9:50 pm UTC, Bitcoin was priced at $49,726. Though Bitcoin is down 0.4% over 24 hours, that price represents 0.7% growth over 1 hour and 2.8% growth from its daily low. […]

The post Bitcoin recovers to $49.7k after failing to find support above $50k appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Kelexo attracts Chainlink and Ethereum investors as crypto surge
description: Chainlink (LINK) and Ethereum (ETH) are firm. Kelexo (KLXO) has attracted over 5,000 registrations, aiming to simplify finance

title: Blockchain analysts detect $4.6m from Duelbits crypto heist
description: Blockchain security platform Cyvers has detected several suspicious transactions from the crypto casino site Duelbits, indicating a security breach.
